meaningMnemonic: The <radical>white</radical> <radical>ice</radical> <radical>tree</radical> is a magical tree. When you eat its ice flowers it gives you incredible amounts of <kanji>comfort</kanji>, <kanji>ease</kanji>, and <kanji>pleasure</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You want more of this. You gather as much as you can, and create an entire <reading>rack</reading> (らく) at your store with this tree. You sell out immediately, and have to refill your rack.
